node.title: Rapper Young Dolph shot dead while buying cookies
node.description: Memphis officials, athletes and numerous members of the music industry pay tribute as rapper Young Dolph dies in a shooting near the city's airport.
node.content: ["Rapper Young Dolph, who was widely admired in the hip-hop community for his authenticity and fierce independence, has been shot dead at a\u00a0cookie shop in the US city of Memphis, Tennessee.", "Police tweeted that they had no information to release about a possible suspect in the shooting, which took place at Makeda's Cookies near Memphis International Airport.", "Just last week, the cookie shop posted a video on Instagram of the rapper, born Adolph Robert Thornton\u00a0Jr, promoting the store's cookies, saying he returned\u00a0to the store whenever he was in Memphis.", "\"The tragic shooting death of rap artist Young Dolph serves as another reminder of the pain that violent crime brings with it,\" Memphis Mayor Jim Strickland said in a statement.", "Like the Los Angeles rapper Nipsey Hussle, who was killed in 2019, Young Dolph, 36,\u00a0pursued an independent approach to the music business.", "Young Dolph had three albums reach the top 10 on the Billboard 200, with 2020's Rich Slave\u00a0peaking at number\u00a04 and its single RNB, featuring Megan Thee Stallion, being certified gold.", "Young Dolph\u00a0recently performed at a concert at the University of Memphis and had\u00a0performed during the half-time show at a Memphis Grizzlies game.", "\"God bless Dolph,\" tweeted Chicago musician Chance the Rapper.", "\"Real independent Memphis rapper born in Chicago. Loved by millions of ppl.\"", "Young Dolph had survived previous shootings.", "He was shot multiple times in September 2017 after a fight outside a Los Angeles hotel.", "In February of that year, his SUV was shot at in Charlotte, North Carolina, more than 100 times.", "The incident was the inspiration for the song 100 Shots.\u00a0He said he survived because he had bulletproof panels in his vehicle, The Commercial Appeal reported.", "Memphis officials, athletes and numerous members of the music industry posted their condolences on social media.", "\"R.I.P. to my friend Dolph this broke my heart,\" rapper Gucci Mane posted on Twitter.", "Young Dolph's\u00a0talent agency, APA, said it was shocked and saddened by his death.", "\"His dedication, drive, hard work and loyalty to all those around him always came first and he will be deeply missed.\"", "AP/ABC"]
